amendment.description: To modify the scope of products to which section 15(b) applies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4137 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4137 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Inouye. (consideration: CR S1693-1696; text: CR S1696) To modify the scope of products to which section 15(b) applies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4137 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4137 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Inouye.
